import React from 'react' import Col from 'react-bootstrap/esm/Col' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/esm/Container' import Image from 'react-bootstrap/esm/Image' import Row from 'react-bootstrap/esm/Row' import bigStar from '../components/star.png' const DevicePage = () => { const device ={id : 1, name : 'Iphone', price : 3000, rating : 5, img : 'https://optim.tildacdn.com/tild3734-3763-4635-b839-346536343966/-/resize/560x/-/format/webp/serious-about-wallpa.png'} return (

{device.name}

{device.rating}
) } export default DevicePage
